name: Stonjourner
description: Once a year, on a specific date and at a specific time, they gather out of nowhere and form up in a circle.

attacks.name: Land’s Pulse
attacks.effect: If a Stadium is in play, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Giga Hammer
